name: Knight Legacy
storyline:
When darkness rules all...
Some strange events happened in the Kingdom, like the murder of your best friend, and the appearance of monsters all around the kingdom. It seems like the Dark Magic is back. Only the knight chosen by the Light Sword can defeat the darkness. To become the Knight of the Legend, our hero must travel and find Towers that are trials from the ancient knights to test the strength of the "chosen one".
summary: A new journey across the Kingdom Of Kavasia awaits you in Knight Legacy! Become a true knight, fight against evil foes and help people with many side quests.
